"I love that education and leadership are unpredictable. No one could have imagined how our world has changed so drastically in such a short period of time. All Pearson and Batcheller 2nd Grade Families are invited to attend our 1st Annual Family STEAM Night at Pearson School on Tuesday, April 30 from 5:30 PM - 7:30 PM. Batcheller 2nd grade families, this is an excellent opportunity for you and your child to experience what Pearson School will be like. The event will begin with pizza being served from 5:30 PM - 6:00 PM in the Pearson Cafeteria followed by every floor of the school having STEAM activities meant for your whole family to do together.
The activities will include:
1. Designing a helmet to protect a raw egg from a drop of 6 feet.
2. Exploring simple machines using your body in the gymnasium.
3. Creating noisemakers in the music room.
4. In the media center, you will experience coding and snap circuits.
5. Playing fun math games that will really get you thinking.
6. Designing a boat that will float and hold the most pennies.
7. Creating works of art with Tesselations in the Art Room.

We hope that you will join us for this very fun family night!!!
